fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
All policies related to social and industrial policies - namely the new ecological regulations on climate changes and their impact on the respective industries and regions. 
We are following also the EU initiative on European Pillar of Social rights, the revision of Posted Workers Directive, the  revision of Directives on Health and Safety, work migration and mobility.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Direct involvement at the legislative process at national level - consultations  on transposition of EU legal order - especially in the field of employment, working conditions, living standards,   social protection issues. Options , expertise, publications in mass media.
goals__remit: PODKREPA CL is a trade union umbrella organization recognized social partner at national level. It has experience in Health and Safety's  at work trainings, as well contacts & relationships with all non-governmental organizations from OSHA spectrum.
